name: Judi Dench
academyawards: Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress
emmyawards: '''Nominated''': Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Lead Actress - Miniseries or a Movie
olivierawards: Best Actress, 1996 ''Absolute Hell'',  1987 ''Antony and Cleopatra'', Best Actress (new play),  1984 ''Pack of Lies'', Best Actress (musical),  1996 ''A Little Night Music'', Best Actress (revival),  1980 ''Juno and the Paycock'',  1977 ''Macbeth''
